abstract: General Electric said commercial loans and major equipment sales contributed to the rise, and it confirmed the sale of its subprime mortgage unit.
snippet: General Electric said commercial loans and major equipment sales contributed to the rise, and it confirmed the sale of its subprime mortgage unit.
lead_paragraph: The General Electric Company, citing strong sales of major equipment and an increase in commercial loans, said yesterday that revenue and profit in the second quarter were up 12 percent over the period a year ago.

headline.main: G.E. Earnings Are Up 12%; Stock Buyback Is Increased
headline.print_headline: G.E. Earnings Are Up 12%; Stock Buyback Is Increased
